extension.valueString: Cancel a specific Product/Service Group in an Invoice
Cancel a specific Product/Service Line Item in an Invoice
Can be used to reverse or cancel an invoice in progress or reverse a paid invoice.  Receiver may only mark Invoice as cancelled, not purge records

concept.display: Authorization request for inpatient stay extension

extension.valueString: Can be used to submit an invoice through a Payer's edit and adjudication engine to determine if the invoice will be paid - does not result in payment by Payer

description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0553 ( Invoice Control Code)
name: v2 Invoice Control Code
